sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./about.css"; import profilepic from "../../assets/Cover.jpg"; import CV from "../../assets/Tobechukwu Uka_Resume.pdf" import downloadicon from "../../assets/download.png" import Info from './Info' const About = () => { return (

About Me

My Introduction

I have experience building scalable applications using a wide range of modern technologies and tools. Some of my key proficiencies include: - Node.js and Express.js: I am skilled in building server-side applications using Node.js and utilizing the Express.js framework. - TypeScript: I have a strong understanding of TypeScript, which enables me to write type-safe and more maintainable code. - React: I am proficient in building interactive and responsive user interfaces using React. - Databases: I have experience working with various databases, including MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and MySQL, for storing and retrieving data efficiently. - Deployment: I am familiar with deploying applications on platforms like Heroku and utilizing containerization with Docker. - Payment Integration: I have integrated payment gateways into applications, allowing secure and seamless transactions. - REST API: I am experienced in designing and developing RESTful APIs to facilitate communication between frontend and backend systems. - Firebase: I have utilized Firebase services, such as authentication, real-time database, and cloud functions, to build powerful applications. - Project Management: I am familiar with tools like JIRA for efficient project management and collaboration. - Testing and QA: I have skills in writing unit tests, performing QA/testing processes, and ensuring the quality and reliability of applications. Apart from my technical expertise, I am a proactive learner, continuously updating my skills and staying abreast of industry trends. I excel in technical documentation, ensuring clear and concise documentation for projects. I possess strong communication and collaboration skills, enabling effective teamwork and coordination. Additionally, I am adept at problem-solving and have experience working in Agile methodologies. Overall, my diverse skill set and passion for technology make me a valuable asset in building innovative and robust applications.

Download CV
) } export default About;
